string.value: Andy the Time Traveler says he has something to tell you before your second time travel.

Andy the Time Traveler has informed you that you must pass the test Next the Gatekeeper of Time, who lives in the Old Tree of Tera, gives you before embarking on your second time travel. Enter the Old Tree of Tera and pass Nex's test.

You have passed the second test given by Nex the Gatekeeper of Time and earned the right to travel to another time. You can now teleport to Midnight Harbor in the year 2099. Go to the Time Gate with the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 90,000\r\nCan participate in "The Hidden Truth about the Past" quest.\r\n
You must pass Nex's test but you can travel to a different time. Don't get too comfortable. Nex will be much stronger this time around.
When you defeat Nex, the Time Gate to the year 2099 will open.
You won't be authorized to travel time unless you defeat Nex the Gatekeeper of Time.
Ah, you've passed Nex's second test. Now then, you should be able to access the Time Gate to the year 2099.
Take the Time Traveler's Pocket Watch and go through the Time Gate.
Come back after you've passed Nex's test. Nex the Gatekeeper of Time lives inside the Old Tree of Tera.
